AutoVariable.label: Bhop
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically bunnyhop.

AutoVariable.label: Capture objectives
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically capture objectives (CTF, CP, and PL only)

AutoVariable.label: Path during setup
AutoVariable.tooltip: Path during setup. Will also path while the gates are closed.

AutoVariable.label: Defend intel
AutoVariable.tooltip: Defend our intel when its dropped or stolen

AutoVariable.label: Defend idle
AutoVariable.tooltip: Defend our current objective if there are no enemy team players or if we are idle

AutoVariable.label: Stay near
AutoVariable.tooltip: Will stay close to target if short range or run away if sniper

AutoVariable.label: Enable FollowBot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically follow other players

AutoVariable.label: Roaming
AutoVariable.tooltip: Look for someone to follow when there is not active target

AutoVariable.label: Change when possible
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allows more changing of follow targets

AutoVariable.label: Synced taunts
AutoVariable.tooltip: Taunt when follow target taunts

AutoVariable.label: Activation range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Max distance to follow a target

AutoVariable.label: Follow distance
AutoVariable.tooltip: Distance to follow target

AutoVariable.label: Mimic slot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Mimic target's weapon slot

AutoVariable.label: Always medigun
AutoVariable.tooltip: Always have the medigun out. Overrides mimic slot

AutoVariable.label: AFK limit
AutoVariable.tooltip: Time a target must be AFK for to switch from them

AutoVariable.label: SteamID to follow
AutoVariable.tooltip: Steamid of player to follow. Highest priority

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize friends
AutoVariable.tooltip: Third highest priority

AutoVariable.label: Draw crumbs
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw follow path

AutoVariable.label: Nav stuck time
AutoVariable.tooltip: Time in milliseconds the bot is stuck until re-path

AutoVariable.label: Nav stuck time
AutoVariable.tooltip: Time in (x) Seconds The Bot Is Stuck Until Re-Path

AutoVariable.label: Nav stuck time exp
AutoVariable.tooltip: How long until accumulated Stuck time expires

AutoVariable.label: Nav block stuck
AutoVariable.tooltip: How long we should blacklist the node after being stuck for too long?
